crime: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command (‘OS Command Injection’)

patterns.name: Using Runtime exec with external input from Intent
patterns.description: Using external strings from Intent as commands without proper validation.

patterns.name: Using Runtime exec with external input from Bundle
patterns.description: Using external strings from Bundle as commands without proper validation.

patterns.name: Using Runtime exec with external input from SharedPreferences
patterns.description: Using external strings from SharedPreferences as commands without proper validation.

patterns.name: Using ProcessBuilder with external input from Intent
patterns.description: Using external strings from Intent to build process commands without proper validation.

patterns.name: Using ProcessBuilder with external input from Bundle
patterns.description: Using external strings from Bundle to build process commands without proper validation.

patterns.name: Using ProcessBuilder with external input from SharedPreferences
patterns.description: Using external strings from SharedPreferences to build process commands without proper validation.

patterns.name: Using Runtime exec with external input
patterns.description: Using external strings as commands without proper validation.
